SMART_TYPERS.HIDE_EMOJIS_DESC: Filters out emojis from display names (will automatically fallback to username, if a nickname is set and it only contains emojis).
SMART_TYPERS.COLORED_GRADIENT_DESC: Displays a gradient over display names by using the color of the user's top-most role.
SMART_TYPERS.DISABLE_INDICATOR_DESC: Removes the animated typing indicator shown before users.
SMART_TYPERS.USER_POPOUT_DESC: Renders a popout that shows basic information about the selected user and provides some additional prompts.
SMART_TYPERS.USER_CONTEXT_MENU_DESC: Renders a context menu that features a variety of actions for managing the targeted user.
SMART_TYPERS.USER_SHIFT_CLICK_DESC: Mentions a user when holding down the ‘⇧ Shift’ key and clicking on their name.
